text: When I graduated from high school, it was during the Depression and we had no money.
author: Ray Bradbury

text: The big difference between sex for money and sex for free is that sex for money usually costs a lot less.
author: Brendan Behan

text: There's so little money in my bank account, my scenic checks show a ghetto.
author: Phyllis Diller

text: I spent a lot of money on booze, birds and fast cars. The rest I just squandered.
author: George Best

text: There is a gigantic difference between earning a great deal of money and being rich.
author: Marlene Dietrich
